          <title>
            <string language="en">Experiment about Brownian motion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Experiment über Brownsche Bewegung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expérience au sujet de mouvement brownien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experiência sobre o movimento brownian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esperimento circa moto browniano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πείραμα για την του BROWN κίνηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Experimento sobre el movimiento browniano</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an experimental set-up used to observe Brownian motion using a smoke cell and a microscope.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">brownian motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">grains</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">microscopes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">smoke</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine experimentelle 
Installation, die verwendet wird, um Brownsche Bewegung mit einer 
Rauchzelle und einem Mikroskop zu beobachten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une installation 
expérimentale employée pour observer le mouvement brownien à l'aide
d'une cellule de fumée et d'un microscope.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma instalação 
experimental usada observar o movimento brownian usando uma pilha do 
fumo e um microscópio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una messa a punto 
sperimentale usata per osservare il moto browniano per mezzo di una 
cellula del fumo e di un microscopio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει πειραματική οργάνωση που 
χρησιμοποιείται για να παρατηρήσει την του BROWN κίνηση 
χρησιμοποιώντας ένα κύτταρο καπνού και ένα μικροσκόπιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una disposición 
experimental usada para observar el movimiento browniano usando una 
célula del humo y un microscopio.</string>
          </description>
